EmailTemplate.description: Sent via button on SSS. Do not modify template name!
EmailTemplate.name: Change in COD Date
EmailTemplate.subject: Update to your solar farm completion date
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good things take time
Learn more
Just a heads up that the estimated completion date of the solar farm you're subsribed to, <solar farm name>, has changed to <season/year>.
While it may take a little longer for your farm to be constructed, please know that your early support ensures the farm can be built. By signing up for a share, you're giving state regulators, utilities, and investors the message that there's a demand for more solar farms to be built.
When you sign up for a share, you're providing an immediate and meaningful impact. Thanks again for your patience.
Have questions?
We're happy to help. Contact a member of our Customer Care team M-F, 9am-5pm at customercare@bluewavesolar.com or 844.786.4100
Get answers
BlueWave Customer Service: customercare@bluewavesolar.com
